review: This is cheap device and can turn your TV to smart TV. One thing this stick can do is live stream from youtube which I cannot do with the smarttv youtube application.
author: Patrick Tsui

review: The intended functionality, I like a lot.  Simple and does an interesting task that with Android Phones and a Chromebook around is very handy...displaying content and managing a queue of content for display or playback through the media system I have.I've never had any luck with wi-fi for streaming however and it could be local RFI (noise) that breaks my wi-fi, have never figured out the source and I work in tech.  So this device can be hit or miss for me simply because my wi-fi is not stable.  It truly requires a stable wi-fi network to function.All my other streaming devices, smart DVD, XBox etc I use a cabled connection for this reason.  I wish this had the option.
author: Kingsqueak

review: Very useful...the lack of a remote type interface keeps it from being perfect.
author: Treymbx

review: It's good and I believe it may be even better. Content that I already have in my phone or laptop should be able to display in the TV screen  with no need of wifi network or Internet conexión.
author: miguel
